metadata.description: Letters to Secretary of National Defense and Communications Major General Basilio Valdes from Benedicto Cunanan and Stanley Lambert regarding telegraph instruments which may be used in reestablishing communications between Tacloban and Palo, Leyte
metadata.subject: Basilio Valdes; World War II; Leyte; official papers; letters; Secretary of National Defense and Communications
metadata.title: Letters to Secretary of National Defense and Communications Major General Basilio Valdes regarding telegraph instruments which may be used in reestablishing communications between Tacloban and Palo, Leyte
